capability.name: Payment Order
capability.definition: This service domain handles the bank-side processing of funds transfers, making the necessary bank and regulatory checks on the involved parties and applying their payment preferences where appropriate
capability.role: Payment Order handles the internal bank and compliance checks and processing of funds transfers prior to initiating the actual mechanics of transfer which is handled by the service domain Payment Execution. This includes watch-list and other regulatory checks and applying any counterparty specific limits and payment preferences. It may also oversee payment netting arrangements between the bank and other counterparties
capability.example: A customer transaction results in the generation of a payment order to transfer funds to an account in another bank

key_features.name: Perform bank and regulatory checks on the payee and payer
key_features.description: Enables perform bank and regulatory checks on the payee and payer to support this service domain handles the bank-side processing of funds transfers, making the necessary bank and regulatory checks on the involved parties and applying their payment preferences where appropriate

key_features.name: Retrieve counterparty payment preferences
key_features.description: Enables retrieve counterparty payment preferences to support this service domain handles the bank-side processing of funds transfers, making the necessary bank and regulatory checks on the involved parties and applying their payment preferences where appropriate

key_features.name: Structure payment execution requests to match preferences
key_features.description: Enables structure payment execution requests to match preferences to support this service domain handles the bank-side processing of funds transfers, making the necessary bank and regulatory checks on the involved parties and applying their payment preferences where appropriate

key_features.name: Oversee counterparty netting arrangements
key_features.description: Enables oversee counterparty netting arrangements to support this service domain handles the bank-side processing of funds transfers, making the necessary bank and regulatory checks on the involved parties and applying their payment preferences where appropriate
